title: How to Make Baked Chickpea or Garbanzo Snacks

steps.headline: Soak the chickpeas overnight, covered in water.
Spread the chickpeas across a shallow baking pan.
Place in a moderate oven (180ºC/350ºF) to bake.
Turn frequently until browned.
steps.description: This will take about 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

steps.headline: Serve or store.
steps.description: Once cooled, the baked chickpeas are ready to serve. Place in an airtight container for storage.

text: Soak the chickpeas overnight, covered in water.  Dry thoroughly.  Spread the chickpeas across a shallow baking pan.  Place in a moderate oven (180ºC/350ºF) to bake.  Turn frequently until browned. This will take about 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Sprinkle with salt. This step is optional. Serve or store. Once cooled, the baked chickpeas are ready to serve. Place in an airtight container for storage.
